description: Max Adonis can have any guy he wants, but sometimes he enjoys the thrill of paying for sex—he enjoys the control it gives him. When he sees how handsome the escort, Jeffrey Lloyd, is, it’s the perfect opportunity for him to have sex with a stud and also have fun with his transactional fetish. Jeffrey is even better looking in person (if that’s even possible), and his uncut cock is so big and so fat, Max Adonis is afraid he won’t even be able to handle it. But Max paid for Jeffrey Lloyd to fuck him rough and deep, and that’s exactly what he gets. Customer service is key, after all!
title: Jeffrey Lloyd Smashes Max Adonis’ Ass
